p: The detailed summary of the experiments performed, together with determined phase compositions are summarized in Supplementary Table 1. Unit cell parameters of the observed phases are given in Supplementary Table 2. Details of crystal structure refinements of SiO 2 high-pressure phases are given in Supplementary Table 3. Supplementary Tables 4– 9 contain information on atomic coordinates and equivalent isotropic displacement parameters of high-pressure coesite phases.
